alert.note: Alert for Benton; Lee; Marshall; Prentiss; Tippah; Union (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 4:02PM CDT until September 06 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Union County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Lee County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Tippah County in northeastern Mississippi... Southern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... West central Prentiss County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bethlehem, or 13 miles east of Wall Doxey State Park, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... New Albany, Blue Mountain, Keownville, Bethlehem, Blair, Hickory Flat, Potts Camp, Myrtle, Dumas, Shari, Graham, Jericho, Branyan, Old Myrtle, Pumpkin Center, Baker, Geeville, Locum, Smalco and Glenfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Lee; Marshall; Prentiss; Tippah; Union
